column2: Fix PY-1177 Control flow analysis doesn't detect while/break

column3: Thanks for your PR! I'll review it later.
We would like to unify our static evaluation code (PyConstantExpressionEvaluator, PyEvaluator, and others) and make it explicit what get evaluated and how much it affects performance.
Does it mean I need to change something or is it just a general comment?

On Monday, July 11, 2016, Andrey Vlasovskikh notifications@github.com
wrote:
@fitermay No, your code looks OK at first glance.
Handle control flow for statically true condition in while statement
